short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Participate DAO governance easily outside of dapps. Injects the accounts, allows signing transaction and send encrypted message.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
SubDAO Chrome Extension（DAOWallet） is a plug-in wallet on Chrome, featuring wallet payment, social networking and DAO management function. It’s dedicated to connecting Web2.0 to Web3.0. Users can take part in DAO voting, make transfer and transactions with friends, etc on Twitter.

SubDAO is a cross-chain DAO protocol, which enables chains to quickly have DAO functionality, including DAO’s creation, funding pool management, voting and so on, to support DAO creators and members in the governance of their organizations.
